sentences.en: ...his herculean efforts to bring peace to our troubled island.
sentences.cn: ...他为给我们纷争不断的岛屿带来和平所付出的艰辛努力。

sentences.en: Eradication of the Alpine nomenclature is still proving a Herculean task.
sentences.cn: 根除阿尔卑斯命名法依然是一项极其艰难的工作.

sentences.en: The two men made a Herculean effort to lift the fallen tree off the victim's car.
sentences.cn: 这两个人为了搬掉倒在受害者汽车上的树花出了巨大的力气.

sentences.en: These small feats seemed like Herculean accomplishm ents and slowly served to restore her depleted confidence.
sentences.cn: 这些小成绩看来是艰辛努力的结果,而且渐渐开始重建起她那已空竭的信心.

sentences.en: Truly none was so fit to set about this herculean labour as Petruchio.
sentences.cn: 这样困难的事除了彼特鲁乔以外确实找不到更合适的人来办了.

trans.tran_cn: (H-)赫拉克勒斯的，力大无比的，骁勇无比的，艰巨的
trans.tran_en: A herculean task or ability is one that requires extremely great strength or effort
